title: Fix CORS policy on production backend for admin login
description: Production login fails with CORS error: 'No Access-Control-Allow-Origin header is present'. Backend needs to configure CORS middleware to allow requests from frontend domain http://s1082203226.onlinehome.us. Laravel should add cors middleware with allowed origins, methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS), and headers (Content-Type, Authorization, Accept).
